entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
